name: Commons: Computer Monsters
description:
Welcome to the world of Commons, where everything is trying to kill you. You're a tiny Bonemeal lost in the world. How long can you survive? Play to find out.

A Pokemon-like rogue-like, you battle all types of critters, trying to collect as many dogbones as possible. Can you help Bonemeal reach level 12? 

Basic WASD control scheme. 1-9 buttons used for spells.

15 spells to help even the odds.

12 different Commons to fight.

Planned updates to include more Commons and new playable characters. 

Monster designs are based on drawings I made as a child (circa 2001). I drew hundreds of these, but sadly only 7 pages survive (containing 56 Commons). I plan on adding all of them to this game.
